subject: Questions about Order #SSN2155
description_text:
Hello, I ordered the Simsonn Pro x Ultra with haptic reactor pedals two 
days ago, and today i saw that the shipment started, but first of all I 
noticed that the number of the the adress is missing, I guess i forgot 
to type it so sorry for that, either way the adress is Via del Pincio 3.

Secondly some minutes ago UPS (while in the order page it appears to be 
DHL the courier) sent me a mail asking for the value of the package and 
other info, I'm asking if everything it's ok or some info is missing, 
thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Lorenzo Pasquini,     We apologize, but we are unable to change the address at this time. You may contact your local DHL office to request an address change once the package arrives in Italy.

Hello the issue of the address was solved, however I have now to pay an
additional price of 97 euros (or 112$) of customs service, and I have to
ask why isnt it written in the store or in the moment that i have to pay?
The delivery stated that I had to pay 30$ and I don't think is fair to come
to knowledge about it like that. At least there should have bene a warning
about the cost of the customs service, or even so there shouldn't have
been, since the pedals I ordered came from germany, and the baseplate from
china.

Hi, I have attached the receipt of the customs payment
